zakresWzorcowania.metodaWzorcowania: Calibration procedure WZOR-1 (ed. 7 of 01.09.2023) and calibration procedure WZOR-2 (ed. 6 of 18.09.2023)
Calibration procedure WZOR-1 (ed. 7 of 01.09.2023) and calibration procedure WZOR-2 (ed. 6 of 18.09.2023)
Calibration procedure WZOR-1 (ed. 7 of 01.09.2023) and calibration procedure WZOR-2 (ed. 6 of 18.09.2023)

informacja.tekst: This certificate is issued under the agreement EA MLA in the field of calibration and provides traceability of measurement results to the International System of Units (SI). The results are traceable to the national standard of gamma-ray kerma in air maintained at the Central Office of Measures (GUM) in Warsaw.

This certificate is issued under the agreement EA MLA in the field of calibration and provides traceability of measurement results to the International System of Units (SI). The results are traceable to the national standard of gamma-ray kerma in air maintained at the Central Office of Measures (GUM) in Warsaw, and in Radioactivity Standard Laboratory OBRI POLATOM and PTB Braunschweig.

The results are traceable to the national standard of gamma-ray kerma in air maintained at the Central Office of Measures (GUM) in Warsaw, and in Radioactivity Standard Laboratory OBRI POLATOM.

The results are traceable to the national standard of gamma-ray kerma in air maintained at the Central Office of Measures (GUM) in Warsaw, and PTB Braunschweig.
